sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react"; import 'semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css' import { Menu, Segment, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react' import SignIn from '../pages/SignIn' import SignOut from '../pages/SignOut' export default function Navi() { const [isAuthenticated, setAuthenticated] = useState(true) function handleSignOut() { setAuthenticated(false) } function handleSignIn() { setAuthenticated(true) } return (
{isAuthenticated ? : }
) }
